dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property, again]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, December 04, 2005 5:17 PM
To: baruch@blessedb.org; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property, again]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Misuse of intellectual property, again
Date: Sat, 3 Dec 2005 22:41:46 -0600
From: Baruch <baruch@blessedb.org>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello:

I previously wrote to you concerning misuse of copyrighted material on a
Website owned or hosted by you.  I have another such Website that contains
exactly the same article by Ms. Thomas, but that contains a different
phrase.

The Website is:

http://www.best-internet-marketing-strategy.info/web-site-marketing-bc.htm

The phrase this time is "website marketing bc", though this is hardly an
issue.  As I commented in my previous communication, this is unacceptable
abuse of Ms. Thomas's work, and the article must be removed.  Please attend
to this at your earliest opportunity.

Thank you.

- -Baruch Ben-David



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDk3jbvK/XpJs6oyURAneXAJwKDOURspZhN8X5p7qAMvGI4xHPeQCdHzGv
nRh4AMu2u5/tNX/RVm/GWDE=
=/PvK
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
